attributes.action: Mandatory Education for children on Sexual Abuse in State and Private Schools in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We victims and survivors of Sexual Abuse, and those not touched by it, (including Incest) wish our children in State and Private Schools through their Sex Education classes be taught about Child Abuse. By implementing this, we will have children growing up in loving, caring and safe environments where they know it is wrong and can speak out with the knowledge that they will be protected and heard.
We will have less adults needing life-long support who are not being reached or getting the correct counselling because of the lack of specialists in this subject specifically Child Sex Abuse, victims and survivors.
